name: sendme
title: Sendme File Share
description: Send and receive files peer-to-peer directly from Raycast with no intermediary servers or accounts required
author: nazif_ishrak

commands.name: index
commands.title: Share File
commands.description: Share files peer-to-peer directly from Raycast with no intermediary servers or accounts required

commands.name: receive
commands.title: Receive File
commands.description: Download a file by pasting a sendme ticket - secure, fast, and with no intermediary servers

preferences.name: autoInstallSendme
preferences.title: Auto Install Sendme
preferences.description: Automatically install sendme when needed without asking
preferences.label: Auto Install

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
